column4: we shouldn't have any really nasty bugs in warty, though, as they should have been found and weeded out before release.
I have lousy disk performance too, this is what lsmod says:
Timing buffered disk reads:   36 MB in 10.25 seconds =   3.51 MB/sec
you can try putting via82cxxx in /etc/modules and see if it helps.
if that works, we have a bug we should track down.
so if it's in /etc/modules it will load earlier?
ok, I've edited it into /etc/modules. bbiab
it seems a bit better, but:
Timing buffered disk reads:    2 MB in  4.63 seconds = 442.30 kB/sec
